gcci.text: H100 availability improves on US-East routes as capex normalization unlocks second‑hand inventory, easing lead times and stabilizing $/hr around $3.31.

gtpi.text: Input token pricing stays aggressive near $1.31/1M as distillation and inference optimization compress costs, intensifying API price wars.

gagl.text: 120 TWh annual load pushes grid interconnections to capacity, making nuclear baseload and storage essential to manage strain and carbon intensity.

aipi.text: Industry sentiment consolidates as utilization rises and capex cycles normalize, signaling a maturing market with measured growth and lower bubble risk.
